argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hosd1.2 | |- T : ~H --> ~H |
| 2 |  | hosd1.3 | |- U : ~H --> ~H |
| 3 | 1, 2, 2 | #P_hoaddsubassi | |- ( ( T +op U ) -op U ) = ( T +op ( U -op U ) ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_hodidi | |- ( U -op U ) = 0hop |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( T +op ( U -op U ) ) = ( T +op 0hop ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_hoaddid1i | |- ( T +op 0hop ) = T |
| 7 | 3, 5, 6 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( ( T +op U ) -op U ) = T |
